def solution(teams, g):
    avg = sum(teams) // g
    groups = [avg] * g
    remaining = sum(teams) % g
    teams.sort(reverse=True)
    i = 0

    for team in teams:
        groups[i] += team
        i = (i + 1) % g
        remaining -= 1

        if remaining == 0:
            break

    groups.sort(reverse=True)
    return groups
